titles.title: End Polluter Welfare Act of 2024
End Polluter Welfare Act of 2024
To eliminate certain subsidies for fossil-fuel production.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Natural Resources, Transportation and Infrastructure, Financial Services, Science, Space, and Technology, Agriculture, Energy and Commerce, Foreign Affairs, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
